content:
I'd be happy to help you set a reminder. However, I'm a large language model, I don't have the ability to access your personal calendar or set reminders for you. But I can certainly help you figure out when you should schedule the follow-up call and provide you with a suggestion.

Since you spoke with the client on Thursday afternoon, you might want to consider scheduling the follow-up call for the same time next week, or a few days after that. This would give you both some time to review any notes or materials discussed during the initial call and make any necessary progress.

Here are a few options you could consider:

* Schedule the follow-up call for next Thursday afternoon, same time as the initial call.
* Schedule the follow-up call for Monday or Tuesday of next week, to give yourself and the client some time to review notes and make progress before reconnecting.
* Schedule the follow-up call for Wednesday of next week, as a mid-week check-in to discuss progress and provide any necessary guidance.

Which of these options sounds most appealing to you, or do you have a different schedule in mind?
